channel.title: Worse Mom Than You
channel.itunes:author: Carrie Hartman & Estie Miller
channel.itunes:summary: Are you the worst mom ever? You have competition. Let’s face it. We're all screwing it up. Join Carrie Hartman and Estie Miller as they discuss their frequent parenting gaffes and talk to other moms about their humorous fails with food, technology, behavior boundaries, healthcare and old standbys like homework and the tooth fairy. You'll hear stories of reassuring incompetence that are sure to remind you that there is always a worse mom than you.
channel.description: Are you the worst mom ever? You have competition. Let’s face it. We're all screwing it up. You'll hear stories of reassuring incompetence that are sure to remind you that there is always a worse mom than you.

item.itunes:title: Snapchat Junkie Mom
item.title: S01 EP02 Snapchat Junkie Mom
item.itunes:author: Carrie Hartman & Estie Miller
item.itunes:subtitle: Are you a mom who snoops? Good for you! According to the law, if you pay for the phone and the "user" is under 18, it's legal. On this episode of Worse Mom Than You, you'll meet a mom who might be sorry she ever looked. Join Carrie Hartman and Estie Miller as they expose a worse moms trying to manage social media and totally blowing it. Plus, Estie is the victim of Snapchat extortion by her own entrepreneurial son. We continue to offer no advice or redeeming social value, just more proof that there's always a worse mom than you.

item.itunes:title: Crazy Lunch Mom
item.title: S01 EP01 Crazy Lunch Mom
item.itunes:author: Carrie Hartman & Estie Miller
item.itunes:subtitle: In the premier episode we meet Heather, aka, crazy lunch mom. This bombshell personal trainer wants her kids to be healthy too and explains how she painstakingly packs her daughter healthy lunch foods, which come home exactly how they left, in their containers. Plus, Carrie confesses that she's become an annoying, nagging nightmare who will do anything to come between her son and french fries, even in the hosptial.

item.itunes:title: S01 EP03 Worse Forgetful Mom Than You
item.title: S01 EP03 Worse Forgetful Mom Than You
item.itunes:author: Carrie Hartman & Estie Miller
item.itunes:subtitle: Some people call it mommy brain. Others realize that we just have too much going on. The bottom line is - moms forget things. On this episode of Worse Mom Than You, we talk to moms who forgot a major kid moment. Whoops, did the Tooth Fairy not get the memo? And if these moms are lucky enough to forget about it, we’re pretty certain that the kids will be there to remind them about their mistakes!
